node.title: Everything you need to know about the trans-Tasman T20 World Cup final
node.alt: Kane WIlliamson smiles and Aaron Finch looks serious in a composite picture
node.description: Australia takes on New Zealand in the T20 World Cup final in Dubai on Sunday night. Here's everything you need to know.
node.content:
["Australia and New Zealand are set to meet in the T20 World Cup final in Dubai in the early hours of Monday morning.", "Not many gave Australia much hope of getting this far in the tournament, but now they're here, a first T20 World Cup title is within their grasp, with just their trans-Tasman rivals standing in their way.", "Here's all you need to know about the T20 World Cup final.", "
When is it?
", "Australia takes on New Zealand\u00a0in Dubai at the far-from socially-friendly hour of 1am AEDT on Monday\u00a0morning.", "That's midnight Sunday in Queensland, 12:30am in South Australia, 11:30pm in the NT\u00a0and 10pm in the west.", "You can watch the match on Fox Sports or Kayo.", "You can also listen to live coverage on ABC Local Radio in all states (except Sydney) from 12:30am, plus on ABC Sport Digital across the country and the ABC Listen App.", "We will also be blogging the match on the ABC Sport website from 12:30am AEDT.", "
How did Australia make the final?
", "", "
Matthew Wade hit three sixes in a row to get Australia over the line.(Getty Images: Alex Davidson)
", "After battling through group 1 with just one defeat to their name, the Australians powered past Pakistan in the semi final on Thursday.", "Matthew Wade smashed three sixes in a row to end the innings and complete the highest successful run chase of the tournament so far, 177.", "Wade, who said the final might be his last match for Australia, slammed 33 runs off his last eight balls in an unbeaten score of 41 to finish the job started by David Warner (49 off 30 balls) and Marcus Stoinis (40 not out off 31).", "Australia had held Pakistan to 4-176 thanks to some brilliant spin bowling by Adam Zampa, who ended with figures of 1-22 from his four overs.", "
How did New Zealand make the final?
", "", "
Jimmy\u00a0Neesham came out and fired New Zealand into the final.(Getty Images: Francois Nel)
", "New Zealand made the final after some heroic late hitting from Daryl Mitchell and James Neesham helped the Black Caps to a five-wicket win over England.", "Chasing 4-166, New Zealand needed\u00a057 runs from their final 24 balls before Neesham (27 off 11 balls) and Mitchell (72 not out off 47) caught fire, plundering 23 runs off Chris Jordan in the 17th over.", "
Why was Jimmy Neesham trending after the match?
", "Neesham played a key role in the semi final\u00a0but did not let the victory go to his head.", "The Kiwi all-rounder took New Zealand's contentious defeat to England in the 50-over World Cup final of 2019\u00a0so badly as to tweet \"Kids, don't take up sport. Take up baking or something. Die at 60 really fat and happy\".", "The 31-year-old is\u00a0clearly still scarred by that, making it pretty clear that just reaching the final is not enough, as evidenced by his stoic reaction on the bench as his teammates celebrated the winning runs around him.", "He quote-tweeted the snap saying, \"Job finished? I don't think so\".", "
The toss is going to be really important, isn't it?
", "You betcha.", "Of the 12 matches that have now taken place in Dubai during this tournament, 11 have been won by the team batting second.", "Why? The dew that comes in at this time of year makes the ball hard to grip, meaning the spinners cannot get the necessary purchase\u00a0to extract turn from what is normally a spinning pitch.", "", "
Adam Zampa has been man of the match in two of the four matches he's played in Dubai at this World Cup.(Getty Images: Matthew Lewis-ICC)
", "Spinners do very well when bowling first \u2014 in half of the matches to be played in Dubai so far at this World Cup, man of the match has been given to a spinner.", "Twice, that spinner was Adam Zampa.", "
Has Australia ever won the T20 World Cup before?
", "Nope.", "There have been six tournaments since the first competition in 2007, with India, Pakistan, England, West Indies (twice) and Sri Lanka taking the honours.", "Australia did reach the final in 2010, where they lost out to England in Barbados.", "New Zealand have never even reached the final before, making this their most successful T20 World Cup tournament.", "The Kiwis have twice been runners up in the 50-over World Cup, a tournament that Australia have won five times.", "", "
David Warner (left) and Steve Smith (right) enjoyed the 2015 50-over final victory over New Zealand.(AP: Rob Griffith)
", "They comfortably lost to Australia in the 2015 decider at the MCG before being beaten by England at Lord's in 2019.", "
What happened last time they met?
", "In one of the pre-tournament warm-up matches, Australia won a tight one against the Black Caps in Abu Dhabi.", "Adam Zampa's 2-17 helped limit New Zealand to 7-158, which Australia chased down with one ball and three wickets to spare thanks to a 30-ball 35 from Steve Smith."]
